description.english: Complete the game without taking any hints (Requires clean playthrough)

description.english: Every cap has a new owner, but no two owners traded their caps (Cupboards & Drawers DLC)
description.french: Chaque chapeau a un nouveau propriétaire, mais deux personnes ne se sont pas échangé leurs chapeaux (DLC Placards et tiroirs)
description.german: Jede Kappe findet einen neuen Besitzer, ohne dass zwei Besitzer nur miteinander getauscht haben. (SCHRÄNKE UND SCHUBLADEN DLC)
description.italian: Ogni cappello ha un nuovo proprietario, ma non ci sono due proprietari che si scambino i loro cappelli (DLC Armadi e cassetti)
description.japanese: すべての帽子が新しい持ち主の元に渡ったが、誰も交換しなかった (DLC「食器棚と引き出し」)
description.koreana: 모든 모자에겐 주인이 있기 마련이죠. 하지만 두 명의 모자 주인은 서로 교환같은 건 하지 않아요. (찬장과 서랍장 DLC)
description.polish: Każda czapka ma nowego właściciela, ale żadna para właścicieli nie wymieniła się czapkami. (CUPBOARDS & DRAWERS – DODATEK)
description.schinese: 每顶帽子都找到了一位新主人，且没有两位帽主互换帽子的情况 (橱柜与抽屉扩展包)
description.spanish: Cada capuchón tiene un dueño nuevo, pero nadie ha intercambiado el suyo (Cupboards & Drawers DLC)
description.tchinese: 每頂帽子都有新主人，但不同主人不會交換戴 (櫥櫃與抽屜 DLC)
description.turkish: Her kapak başka bir eşyaya takılmıştır ama hiçbir eşya birbirinin kapağını almamıştır (CUPBOARDS & DRAWERS YENİ İÇERİĞİNİ)

description.english: I'll go left, you go right (Seeing Stars DLC)

description.japanese: 私は左に、君は右に (Seeing Stars DLC)
description.koreana: 난 왼쪽으로, 넌 오른쪽으로 (Seeing Stars DLC)

description.english: Solve the Music Box with the Counter set to the hidden number (Seeing Stars DLC)
